page.title: 01An Outline Of Our Area
page.content: The land covering our twelve squares is flat.The soil is a mixture of chalk and clay.Most of the land is agricultural. Bedgrove is one of the largest housing estates in the United Kingdom,a part of which is in one of our squares. Nearby Halton has an RAF camp,with a small airfield used for gliders and training. About a mile away from Halton is Weston Turville village which dates back to Roman times.A further mile away is Aston Clinton,which also dates back to Roman times.The A41 which runs through Aston Clinton was a Roman road. Stoke Mandeville is still a village although its nearly becoming a suburb of Aylesbury,which is the nearby market town.
